definition: Shao Yong (1011-1077), Northern Song poet and Rationalist scholar 理學家|理学家
surname Shao/place name
harmony
surname Yong

sentences.english: Most previous studies on Shao Yong's poetics are from the perspective of Li-Xue.
sentences.chinese: 以往對邵雍詩學的研究，多從理學角度着眼。

sentences.english: Shao Yong s philosophical ideology is the typical cognition of complementary Confucianism and Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 邵雍的哲學思想是典型的儒道互補的架構。

definition: Cheng Hao (1032-1085), Song neo-Confucian scholar

scholar of the rationalist school of Neo-Confucianism 理學|理学[Li3 xue2]

Kong Yingda (574-648), Confucian scholar
another name for Laozi 老子[Lao3 zi3]
Zhou Dunyi (1017-1073), Song dynasty neo-Confucian scholar
